methods.name: offsetCalendar
methods.description: Increment or decrement calendar view's month or year
methods.description_zh: 递增或递减日历视图的月份或年份

methods.name: setCalendarTo
methods.description: Change current year and month of the Calendar view; It gets corrected if using navigation-min/max-year-month and sets the current view to Calendar
methods.description_zh: 更改 Calendar （日历） 视图的当前年份和月份;如果使用 navigation-min/max-year-month，则会更正它，并将当前视图设置为 Calendar

events.name: update:model-value
events.params: (value: String,Array,Object,null, reason: String, details: Object) => void

events.name: navigation
events.description: Emitted when user navigates to a different month or year (and even when the model changes from an outside source)
events.description_zh: 当用户导航到其他月份或年份时发出（甚至当模型从外部源更改时）

events.name: range-start
events.description: User has started a range selection

events.name: range-end
events.description: User has ended a range selection

v-model.description: Date(s) of the component; Must be Array if using 'multiple' prop; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 组件的日期;如果使用 'multiple' prop，则必须为 Array;使用此属性（以及 'update：model-value' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令
v-model.desc: Date(s) of the component; Must be Array if using 'multiple' prop; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive
examples: # v-model="[myDate1, { from: myDateFrom, to: myDateTo }, myDate2]"

title.description: When specified, it overrides the default header title; Makes sense when not in 'minimal' mode
title.description_zh: 指定后，它将覆盖默认标题;不在“最小”模式下时有意义

subtitle.description: When specified, it overrides the default header subtitle; Makes sense when not in 'minimal' mode
subtitle.description_zh: 指定后，它将覆盖默认的 Header Subtitle;不在“最小”模式下时有意义

default-year-month.description: The default year and month to display (in YYYY/MM format) when model is unfilled (undefined or null); Please ensure it is within the navigation min/max year-month (if using them)
default-year-month.description_zh: 当 model 未填充（undefined 或 null）时要显示的默认年份和月份（以 YYYY/MM 格式）;请确保它在导航最小/最大年-月内（如果使用它们）

mask.description: Mask (formatting string) used for parsing and formatting value
mask.description_zh: 用于解析和格式化值的掩码（格式字符串）

default-view.description: The view which will be displayed by default

years-in-month-view.description: Show the years selector in months view
years-in-month-view.description_zh: 在月视图中显示年份选择器

events.description: A list of events to highlight on the calendar; If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a Boolean (matches or not); If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
events.description_zh: 要在日历上突出显示的事件列表;如果使用函数，它将日期作为 String 接收，并且必须返回布尔值（匹配或不匹配）;如果使用函数，则为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围引用它，而不是内联定义它

event-color.description: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette); If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a String (color for the received date); If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
event-color.description_zh: 颜色名称（来自 Quasar 调色板）;如果使用函数，它将日期作为 String 接收，并且必须返回 String （接收日期的颜色）;如果使用函数，则为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围引用它，而不是内联定义它

options.description: Optionally configure the days that are selectable; If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a Boolean (is date acceptable or not); If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline; Incompatible with 'range' prop
options.description_zh: （可选）配置可选择的日期;如果使用函数，它将日期作为 String 接收，并且必须返回布尔值（日期是否可接受）;如果使用函数，则为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围内引用它，并且不要内联定义它;与 'range' prop 不兼容

navigation-min-year-month.description: Lock user from navigating below a specific year+month (in YYYY/MM format); This prop is not used to correct the model; You might want to also use 'default-year-month' prop
navigation-min-year-month.description_zh: 锁定用户，使其无法在特定年份 + 月份下方导航（以 YYYY/MM 格式）;此 prop 不用于更正模型;你可能还想使用 'default-year-month' prop

navigation-max-year-month.description: Lock user from navigating above a specific year+month (in YYYY/MM format); This prop is not used to correct the model; You might want to also use 'default-year-month' prop
navigation-max-year-month.description_zh: 锁定用户无法在特定年份 + 月份上方导航（采用 YYYY/MM 格式）;此 prop 不用于更正模型;你可能还想使用 'default-year-month' prop

no-unset.description: Remove ability to unselect a date; It does not apply to selecting a range over already selected dates
no-unset.description_zh: 删除取消选择日期的功能;它不适用于在已选择日期上选择范围

first-day-of-week.description: Sets the day of the week that is considered the first day (0 - Sunday, 1 - Monday, ...); This day will show in the left-most column of the calendar
first-day-of-week.description_zh: 设置被视为第一天的星期几（0 - 星期日，1 - 星期一，...）;这一天将显示在日历最左侧的列中
first-day-of-week.default: # based on configured Quasar lang language

today-btn.description: Display a button that selects the current day
today-btn.description_zh: 显示用于选择当前日期的按钮

multiple.description: Allow multiple selection; Model must be Array
multiple.description_zh: 允许多选;Model 必须是 Array

range.description: Allow range selection; Partial compatibility with 'options' prop: selected ranges might also include 'unselectable' days
range.description_zh: 允许范围选择;与 'options' prop 部分兼容：所选范围也可能包括 'unselectable' 日期

emit-immediately.description: Emit model when user browses month and year too; ONLY for single selection (non-multiple, non-range)
emit-immediately.description_zh: 当用户浏览月份和年份时也发出 model;仅适用于单选 （非多选、非范围）

landscape.description: Display the component in landscape mode
landscape.description_zh: 在横向模式下显示组件

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: The color used to color the separator, which can be any color from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

slots.name: default
slots.description: This is where additional buttons can go
slots.description_zh: 这是其他按钮可以去的地方
